caption.p: ( A) Picture of Brucea javanica plant (Credit: Yercaud Elango under CC BY-SA 4.0 license); ( B) Picture of Brucea javanica fruit (Credit: Ruben C. J. Lim under CC BY-NC-SA 2.0 license); ( C) Chemical structure of a quassinoid molecule, where R denotes a generic substituent group; ( D) Chemical structures of linoleic acid and oleic acid molecules. Reproduced with permission from Ref. [ 4].
